About Me

Hi, I'm Lisa! I'm a frontend developer with a passion for creating accessible and visually appealing web experiences.

I work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and have built dynamic websites using Node.js, Express, and EJS. I also enjoy working with modern frameworks like SvelteKit and Astro.

Currently I'm learning some React and diving into PHP.

More About Me

I enjoy combining code and creativity, whether it's in experimenting with UX/UI design in Figma, playing with animations in CSS, or messing with P5.js.

When I'm not coding, I'm reading a good book or playing some games!
